name: The Best Mayor
description:
Good morning/afternoon! I came up with the idea of this game and I created it in 2 nights. The game seemed good, so I decided to post it here, on itch io.

There is no specific plot in the game, you just build your city and watch how your actions affect it!

• Create any appearance of the city that you want! Only your imagination limits you

• Spend money at your discretion

• Watch the consequences of your actions and only you influence them!

• Will your city prosper or wither?

• There are 4 indicators in total: try to raise them all and keep them on the level!

• Support and develop the city

• Follow the indicators and achieve the best results!

What your city will be like is up to you!

Genre: Constructor, economic strategy, city, buildings, sandbox

The game was made in 2 nights, and by one person, that's why it's like this now. I have many more ideas on how to improve it, but I want to see your opinion. If I see activity, the game will be updated and supplemented.

There are plans to add new events, indicators and objects!

Feedback. Write  to my twitter. Since this is the first version - there is not much that I wanted to add here. In addition, I am interested in the game developing, so suggestions are welcome.
